name: collections::vec_deque::VecDeque::<T, A>::write_iter_wrapping

collections::vec_deque::VecDeque::<T, A>.doc:
Writes all values from `iter` to `dst`.

 # Safety

 Assumes no wrapping around happens.
 Assumes capacity is sufficient.

collections::vec_deque::VecDeque<T, A>::: Unknown([Field(0, Ty { id: 6349, kind: RigidTy(Ref(Region { kind: ReErased }, Ty { id: 6351, kind: RigidTy(Adt(AdtDef(DefId { id: 4596, name: "collections::vec_deque::VecDeque" }), GenericArgs([Type(Ty { id: 10, kind: Param(ParamTy { index: 0, name: "T" }) }), Type(Ty { id: 21, kind: Param(ParamTy { index: 1, name: "A" }) })]))) }, Mut)) })])

doc:
Writes all values from `iter` to `dst`, wrapping
 at the end of the buffer and returns the number
 of written values.

 # Safety

 Assumes that `iter` yields at most `len` items.
 Assumes capacity is sufficient.
